    • Method Detail

      • isProxy

        public int isProxy(java.lang.String clientcert)
            throws MethodInvalidParamException
        Test, if the system identified by the given client certificate, is proxy.
        Parameters:
        clientcert - client certificate of the system.
        Returns:
        1 if system is proxy, 0 otherwise.
        Throws:
        MethodInvalidParamException - thrown if certificate is invalid.

      • deactivateProxy

        public int deactivateProxy(java.lang.String clientcert)
                    throws ProxyNotActivatedException,
                           MethodInvalidParamException
        Deactivates the system identified by the given client certificate.
        Parameters:
        clientcert - client certificate of the system.
        Returns:
        1 if the deactivation succeeded, 0 otherwise.
        Throws:
        ProxyNotActivatedException - thrown if server is not a proxy.
        MethodInvalidParamException - thrown if certificate is invalid.

      • activateProxy

        public int activateProxy(java.lang.String clientcert,
                java.lang.String version)
                  throws ProxyAlreadyRegisteredException,
                         MethodInvalidParamException,
                         ProxySystemIsSatelliteException,
                         InvalidProxyVersionException
        Activates the proxy identified by the given client certificate.
        Parameters:
        clientcert - client certificate of the system.
        version - Proxy version
        Returns:
        1 if the deactivation succeeded, 0 otherwise.
        Throws:
        ProxyAlreadyRegisteredException - thrown if system has already been registered.
        MethodInvalidParamException - thrown if certificate is invalid.
        ProxySystemIsSatelliteException - thrown if client certificate is for a satellite
        InvalidProxyVersionException - thrown if version is not supported.
        ProxyNeedManagementException - thrown if system does not have the management entitlement.

      • listAvailableProxyChannels

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> listAvailableProxyChannels(java.lang.String clientcert)
        List available version of proxy channel for the system.
        Parameters:
        clientcert - client certificate of the system.
        Returns:
        1 if the deactivation succeeded, 0 otherwise.
        Since:
        10.5
